TERMS OF USE AGREEMENT

GENERAL

The City of Toronto, Public Health Division ("City") maintains the Immunization Connect Ontario ("ICON") website for the City of Toronto Health Unit. ICON is a web-based service provided by the Ontario Ministry of Health and Long-Term Care to enable the public to electronically submit and retrieve certain immunization information.

When you click the "Accept" button when entering ICON and by using ICON, you are agreeing to comply with and be bound by the following terms of use. Please review the following terms carefully. If you do not agree with these terms you cannot use or gain access to ICON.

You may also access or submit immunization information to the City using one or more of the following methods:

LIMITED RIGHT TO USE

Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, you are granted the right to access, view and use ICON for your personal, non-commercial use.

You may only access and use ICON to submit and/or retrieve immunization records you are lawfully permitted to access and use.

You will only enter information to ICON that you know to be accurate. You will report any errors in or concerns about ICON to TPH’s Vaccine Preventable Disease Program by telephone, mail or by fax as set out in paragraph one of this agreement.

You are responsible for safeguarding your login credentials and personal or personal health information, including your Ontario Immunization ID (OIID) and PIN, before, during and after your use of ICON.

You are responsible for the security of the device, browser and network that you are using to access the ICON website and transmit information.

You will provide accurate ICON login credentials where required.

NO HARMFUL USE

You warrant that the information or material that you provide to ICON through your access to or use of ICON does not infringe the rights of any person or entity.

Without limiting the generality of the foregoing you shall not:

  • Impersonate any other person or entity or make any misrepresentations
  • Unlawfully delete or revise any material posted by any other person or entity
  • Use ICON in such a manner as to gain unauthorized entry or access to information on ICON, to post unauthorized information on ICON or to gain unauthorized entry or access to any password-protected or restricted area of the ICON or the City's computer or network systems
  • Interfere with or disrupt ICON or computer networks connected thereto
  • Violate any law or regulation or any generally accepted Internet practice or interfere with any other legitimate ICON user's ability to use ICON and any of the services or provided by ICON

NON-TRANSFERABILITY AND PASSWORDS

Any password or right given to you to use ICON is not transferable.

COLLECTION, USE AND DISCLOSURE OF PERSONAL AND PERSONAL HEALTH INFORMATION

The Municipal Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act (MFIPPA) and the Personal Health information Protection Act (PHIPA) apply to all information collected by the City, including Toronto Public Health. The information will only be collected, used and disclosed in accordance with MFIPPA and PHIPA.

Please refer to the Toronto Public Health Information Practice Statement for more information.
